title: FS: Random commons including ANOTHER EPDG.
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Random commons including ANOTHER EPDG.
posts.post_content:
Got some dupes I'm looking to sell. Would be willing to trade too if you have upgrades or EPDGs I need.

And I'm always willing to make a deal, especially on multiples.  But if someone says I'll take it, that gets precedence.  Sorry on rough scans for the SGC cards.

PPF&F only please.  Buyer pays $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards. 3 or more and shipping on me.

$19 Doolan Fielding SGC 20
$34 Dorner SGC 40
$38 Paskert PSA 3
$12 Casey
$26 Merkle Throwing 
$55 Campbell EPDG.  TOUGH with this back. Not an easy one to find.
